import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {createBill, fetchBill} from '../../redux/actions/bill/billAction' function AddBill() { const [productKey, setProductKey] = useState(" ") const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchBill()) }, [dispatch]) const billList = useSelector(state => state.bill) const {billItems} = billList; const billDetails = billList.billItems console.log(billDetails) [ { "_id": "61ab35418166b2b92dc50937", "productKey": " PRODUCT001", "quantity": 2, "__v": 0, "bill": [ { "_id": "61ab20c68f72ed2b2d158ba6", "itemName": " Pencil", "productKey": " PRODUCT001", "unitPrice": 7 } ], "id": "61ab35418166b2b92dc50937" } ] const formSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createBill(productKey, quantity)) setProductKey(" ") setQuantity(0) } return (
Product Key setProductKey(e.target.value)} /> Quantity setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
{/* {billItems && billItems.map((billItem) => { return( ) })} */}
Item Name Quantity Unit Price Total Amount
{billItem[0].bill.itemName} {billItem.quantity} {billItem.unitPrice} {billItem.quantity * billItem.unitPrice }
) } export default AddBill
